article: Many years ago, whites ruled South Africa. Apartheid was the  _  of the land. One evening, two middle-aged blacks met in a "whites only" section of Johannesburg. One of them had a permit to work in the area, the other did not, which  _  he could be put behind bars for staying in this zone.  _  they saw a policeman coming towards them, and  _  . "Run!" whispered the man with the permit to his friend, "I'll  _  " They started running and the policeman began chasing them, shouting "stop, stop". Finally he caught the second man. "Did you think you could outrun me!" he snarled. "Show me your  _  !" The man, playing for time, began reaching in his pocket and finally took out his permit. The policeman was surprised and realized that he had been  _  . The man without the permit was now too far away to be caught. "When you had a permit why did you run!" he shouted  _  . "Doctor's  _  ," said the man. "He has asked me to run a mile every evening." "Oh, yes? " Sneered the policeman. "Then why was your friend  _  ?" "His doctor has also ordered him to run," said the man. The policeman became  _  with anger. "You think you're very  _  , don't you?" he snarled. "But tell me, if you were running  _  for your health why didn't you stop when you saw me running after you? And don't tell me you didn't see me chasing you. I know you did!" "Of course I  _  you were running after me," said the man. "Then why didn't you stop?" asked the policeman. "It was  _  of me," said the man, "but I thought you too had been ordered to run by your doctor."
